result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. LARRY ANDERSON

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant LARRY ANDERSON in court.  Attorney Michael Lim in court for LARRY ANDERSON.  Prosecuting attorney Amanda Nash in court for the State of Wisconsin. Adjournment requested. Bond continues.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

BATTERY (DV); DC (DV)
CONDITIONS: No contact with V1 in OPD report# 22-31358 or the 800 block of Wisconsin St, Oshkosh. Defendant does acknowledge they've been advised who the victim(s) is/are. May pick up belongings one time accompanied by police escort once 72 hour no contact is no longer in effect, provided there are no other court orders prohibiting contact.

3:07 PM Defendant LARRY ANDERSON appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Emma K Blankschein appeared by video, with intern Kou Thao, for LARRY ANDERSON.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Jeanne Struve in court for the State of Wisconsin. Given/has complaint. Advised of charges & potential penalties. The Court did confirm with the State that they are in compliance with Marsy's Law; asked if anyone wanted to address the Court. The defendant authorized the Court to send text message reminders of upcoming court hearings. Bond set by the court. Record closed @ 3:15.

ADDRESS INFO for LARRY ANDERSON
Current: 830 Wisconsin ST, Apt 4, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 09-07-2022)
